body.p:
State of Kentucky
County of Cumberland } S.S
I A Keene certify that I was a major in the 1st" Reg. Ky. Cav. U.S. Vol & that Robert Mayo who was a private in said Regiment was a good soldier and served three years in said Regiment:

I also certify that said Mayo was by me while Capt of Co. I. ^was left sick and^ placed on detached service with Major Sawyers at Somerset, Ky and I hope he may be pardoned for any act for which he may be indicted while he was a soldier in said Regiment

A.T Keen
Late Majr 1st Ky Cav
